name: Mailchimp Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Mailchimp Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Mailchimp events via webhooks

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey

list.name: list
list.description: The list that is gonna fire the event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
list.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Name or ID | 作用: The list that is gonna fire the event. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

events.name: events
events.description: The events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled
events.natural_language_description: 参数名: Events | 作用: The events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: Campaign Sent (值: campaign) - Whether the webhook is triggered when a campaign is sent or cancelled
Cleaned (值: cleaned) - Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's email address is cleaned from the list
Email Address Updated (值: upemail) - Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's email address is changed
Profile Updated (值: profile) - Whether the webhook is triggered when a subscriber's profile is updated
Subscribe (值: subscribe) - Whether the webhook is triggered when a list subscriber is added
Unsubscribe (值: unsubscribe) - Whether the webhook is triggered when a list member unsubscribes

sources.name: sources
sources.description: The possible sources of any events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled
sources.natural_language_description: 参数名: Sources | 作用: The possible sources of any events that can trigger the webhook and whether they are enabled | 默认值: [] | (必填项)
available_options: User (值: user) - Whether the webhook is triggered by subscriber-initiated actions
Admin (值: admin) - Whether the webhook is triggered by admin-initiated actions in the web interface
API (值: api) - Whether the webhook is triggered by actions initiated via the API
